script:
# script "lisp"
# background %(wayback_background)s
# bgmfile "bgm255" "BgmSeaDate" 0
# body %(unit_a)s
# pos %(unit_a)s 3
# mask %(unit_a)s off
# chara %(unit_a)s
# fadein "black" 0.5
# textflame 0 0
@
帰り道－

# fadein "white" 0.5
# se "SE_0735"
# bgm "stop"
# waitandnext 2
@
…………

# fadein "white" 0.5
# se "SE_0735"
# waitandnext 2
@
…………

@
ふと、
傍らを歩く彼女が足を止めた…

# bgmfile "bgm255" "BgmSeaDate" 0
# textflame 1 1
# face %(unit_a)s "sad"
# voice 6008 "guridavoru_0001"
@グリダヴォル
ねぇ…？

@グリダヴォル
えっと…
急なんだけどさ…

@グリダヴォル
私のこと…
どれだけ知ってくれているかっていう
クイズにチャレンジしない？

# face %(unit_a)s "smile"
# voice 6008 "guridavoru_0004"
@グリダヴォル
いいよね？

# face %(unit_a)s "normal"
@グリダヴォル
私の星座ってわかる？

# se "SE_0734"
# select "射手座" "select_label_wrong1" "おうし座" "select_label_wrong2" "うお座" "select_label_correct"
私の星座ってわかる？

# label "select_label_wrong1"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_wrong2"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_correct"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 0.1

# fadeout "black" 1.2
# waitandnext 2
